SEARCH
Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the game logic and data for the multiplayer game. This class manages the game grid, player turns, scores, and block merging logic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
    Constructs a new game instance and initializes the grid and walls.

  • Method Details

    • swapActivePlayer

      public BColor swapActivePlayer()
      Swaps the active player.
      Returns:
      The BColor of the new active player.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • getWinner

      public BColor getWinner()
      Gets the winner of the game.
      Returns:
      The BColor of the winning player, or BColor.NEUTRAL if no winner.

    • mergeLine

      public ArrayList<MovableGridItem> mergeLine(ArrayList<MovableGridItem> blocks, int lineIndex, int offsetIndex, boolean isVertical, boolean isBackwards)
      Merges blocks in the given array. The blocks are merged from left to right. Elements will always be merged to the largest possible element.
      Parameters:
      blocks - The line of blocks to merge. Any null values are considered empty tiles.
      lineIndex - The index of the line in the larger grid that is being merged.
      offsetIndex - The index of how far up the line the merge starts. This is used for when we merge multiple times in one row/col because of walls.
      isVertical - Whether or not the blocks are moving vertically or not.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of merged blocks. All empty blocks will have been removed.

      Returns:
      The color of this player

      Gets whose turn it is currently
      Returns:
      the BColor of whoever's turn it is.

    • addBlock

      public boolean addBlock(int row, int col, int value)
      Adds a block to the grid at the specified position with the current player's color.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the block.
      col - The column index of the block.
      value - The value of the block.
      Returns:
      true if the block was added successfully, false otherwise.

      col - The column index of the block.
      value - The value of the block.
      color - The color of the block.
      Returns:
